title: Haunted
description:
If you liked Twilight or Claimed by the Alphas you will like this story!   
   A full moon, a cabin in the woods, a vampire, and a werewolf on the loose... 
 After being jilted and transformed into a vampire by a past lover, former chemist Victoria hides in the woods near the small town of Salem, hoping to maintain a low profile. Things take a turn on Halloween when a handsome stranger walks into town.  At first Jack seems like any other rugged countryman, exploring the terrain, but as Victoria grows closer to him, she discovers something about him - he makes her feel different... he makes her feel alive again.  Will this reclusive vampire be able to accept this stranger into her life? Or will her past come back to haunt her?  ***This story contains adult subject matter. Adults only!***  keywords: m/f, new adult sex, new adult paranormal romance
author: Violette Paradis
